dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (softly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm putting you on the coin... Your essence... That way you'll always be with me when I dive. She smiles, closes her eyes.  He swings the coin over her face gently, some kind of private ceremony.  She looks just a little intimidated. The coin is now dangling in front of her mouth.  She hesitates then opens her mouth, JACQUES lets the coin slide into it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACQUES walks up to the diving platform. LAWRENCE has fixed scientific equipment on his chest. JACQUES wets and slowly puts them on. ENZO watches from the deck, his expression has changed. JOHANA, on the deck also, opposite ENZO, watches a little worried.  JACQUES concentrates then releases the gueuse and lets himself disappear under the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACQUES dives down very fast.  The control takes place at 200 feet, the doctors check him and let him go.  He continues his descent, it's getting darker and darker around him. The gueuse stops at the level of the underwater platform, just below the diver, who swims over to him in a sea of bubbles from his oxygen bottles.  He asks JACQUES if he i alright, JACQUES nods and gives him a huge smile before swimming off, downwards! The diver realizes and starts after him.  He grabs JACQUE by one of his fins and pulls him back to the round platform.  JACQUES lets go of the balloon. The diver panics.  JACQUES slowly motions that everything is fine and slowly paddles up to the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boat's huge stop watch indicates min:  4:50, then 5:00, then 5:10.  JACQUES has been down there for over 5 minutes. JOHANA is worried sick.  ENZO doesn't know what to make o it and LAWRENCE feels completely helpless.  The stopwatch indicates 5:20, then 5:25 and JACQUES, half unconscious, brakes through the surface of the water. JOHANA screams and cries with joy when she sees him.  The crowd applauds.  ENZO is somber. NOVELLI takes the plaque from JACQUES' hands and turns to the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (stunned)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 360 feet!  He dove 360 feet!!! The crowd cheers in excitement. ENZO is sullen.  LAWRENCE is very worried.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a pile of gear on the dock. ENZO is in the boat loading one piece of luggage at a time, JACQUES comes up to the boat.  Parked in the background, we see a taxi waiting with JOHANA sitting in the back seat.  ENZO pretends not to notice JACQUES' arrival. JACQUES watches him for a moment then finally dares to speak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pointing at taxi)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... There's a party at the hotel tonight. ENZO keeps loading up the boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (busy)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enzo, don't be angry.  I was lucky... that's all. ENZO throws the last duffel bag into the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (serious)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll see you in Amorgos. ENZO turns around and jumps onto his boat. JACQUES walks off the dock, past the cab.  JOHANA opens the door to let him in, but he keeps walking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacques...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You go back, I'll walk. He walks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The park is empty as JACQUES approaches the pool. TINA the dolphin, jumps out of the water, swims to meet JACQUES.  JACQUES pats her and kneels to talk to TINA NINA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sadly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won today.  I dove very deep, Tina. The dolphin giggles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's so funny?  Can you dive deeper? The dolphin nods "yes". JACQUES smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you understand everything? The dolphin nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's good... So tell me why they're all angry at me?  Why is Enzo angry?  I never wanted to compete with him.  I never wanted to be champion of anything... All I want is to escape from them all... For just a few minutes, no people... No noise... Nothing but the sea. The dolphin nods and giggles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you really understand me?  Huh? Are we actually having a conversation here? Again the dolphin nods "yes".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right then, tell me:  can I ever dive as deep as you?  Stay under as long...? A beat.  Then the dolphin nods "yes".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you sure? The two other dolphins stick their heads out of the water They all nod together. JACQUES is awed and perplexed at the same time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The little town of Amorgos is beautiful, mountainous. It's surrounded by a luminous turquoise sea, with white villas clinging to hillsides.  There is a small port.  (w saw it in the opening sequence) Further along the coast, we see the Diving Federation Committee Boat surrounded by all sorts of activity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the open windows we can see parts of the village where JACQUES grew up.  He's staring out the window, lost in his own thoughts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's beautiful, isn't it? Behind him, JOHANA is hiding and throwing up.  He walks t her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's nothing.  Just the long trip. I'm a little jet-lagged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want to lie down for a while?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'll be fine.  Can you just hand me a glass of water? While JACQUES gets her the water, JOHANA stares at the view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ROBERTO stands on the port, waiting for his brother. Suddenly the sound of a motor boat and twelve note horn echoes in the bay. The boat has just arrived at the town dock. ENZO, tears rolling down his cheeks from the wind, throws a duffel bag on the dock and looks up at ROBERTO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is he here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (uncomfortable)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's training. ENZO makes a face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JOHANA sits on the little dock in front of the hotel. JACQUES pulls on his fins, looks out into the water. She clutches a stopwatch, ready to set it off. A few yards behind, hidden between two bungalows, ENZO watches them.  JACQUES takes a few deep breaths and dives a few feet underwater. JOHANA starts the stopwatch. ENZO, who sees JACQUES disappear, walks over to JOHANA an sits down beside her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, now we have a good five minutes to have a nice peaceful talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Checking out the competition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enzo, why do you guys do this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (teasing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What else is there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (seriously)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what I'm talking about. Why do you and Jacques risk your lives diving?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (avoiding the question)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You risk your life when you cross the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (frustrated)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn it!  Why won't you give me a straight answer, for once?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you'd laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won't, I swear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (seriously)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I dive in search of God.  If I go deep enough I'm going to find him. To me, the sea is a religion... That surprises you, doesn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking down at Jacques in the water)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little... You think it's the same for Jacques?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shaking his head)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.  Jacques is a creature of the sea.  He isn't meant to live on earth, among us... You should know this, Johana.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reassuring herself)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He can learn.  He is learning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really think so?  Did you tell him you were pregnant?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (surprised)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How do you know that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You told Bonita, but you didn't tell him, right? JOHANA shakes her head negatively.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Not yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because he won't understand and it will just hurt you... Jacques has been put on earth by complete mistake.  And he's only waiting for one thing:  that some God up there will turn him into a fish!  How long has that moron been down there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking at the stopwatch)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five minutes and fifty seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (grabbing away the stopwatch)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That idiot! They jump up.  ENZO dives into the water. As JOHANA watches panicky, ENZO pulls JACQUES up onto the dock, in his arms.  JACQUES is unconscious. ENZO is furious.  The fear of loosing his friend has absolutely enraged him.  He starts pacing up and down the dock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is he alright?  What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (furious)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fool was asleep!  If I weren't around, he'd already be dead!!!  Is that who you want to live with? Well, good luck!  You better learn to look after him because I won't always be here to do it! Once again he marches off, then comes back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mumbling)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... How long was I asleep?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Jacques)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Long enough to die.  Listen, if you really want to die, that's your problem, but don't do it under my nose, okay? A few steps away, then coming back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Jacques)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll never let you take away my title.  D'you hear me?  Never! ENZO stalks off defiantly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's activity.  The competition has begun.

dialogues.speaker: MUSIC
dialogues.text: A SERIES OF QUICK SHOTS of different competitors at various points in their dives. The Tahitian comes up unconscious. The German comes up unconscious. So does the diver from the Philippines. NOVELLI doesn't know what to think.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACQUES is in a T-shirt and jeans, rope-sole sandals. JOHANA wears a light white cotton dress.  They both sit o the restaurant's terrace overlooking the sea. Below them, a small boat passes.  In it are baskets fille with sponges.  JACQUES stares at them for a long time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you ever sometimes just stop and think how sweet life can be? A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Sure. JOHANA wants to say something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... When you dive... with that machine... What does it feel like?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after thinking about it)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... The feeling of slipping without falling... The hardest is once you are at the bottom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because you have to find a good reason to come back up again... And I always have a hard time finding one. JOHANA has never looked so sad and lost. JACQUES doesn't notice. ENZO who is sitting at the piano behind them, starts to play, staring at the sea. JACQUES and JOHANA turn around and look at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... You should start playing the piano, the piano is really refreshing, it clears the sinuses. Very good the piano!  Tomorrow is going to be a big day!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's alone in the bow.  The others are clustered in the saloon, cockpit in the stern.  The boat is moving close t the cliffs.  The monastery looms above them.

dialogues.speaker: JACQUES
dialogues.text: He's scanning the apparently abandoned monastery searchin for signs of life. A red and blue taxi-boat pulls up alongside the Committee Boat.  In it, LAWRENCE waits to climb on board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ENZO puts his flippers on and grabs his gueuse.  He is serious, concentrating hard. LAWRENCE'S boat slides along the big Committee Boat and the DOCTOR climbs onto it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LAWRENCE'S briefcase is open.  There's a stack of graph paper on a cabin table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... When I analyzed the data from Mayol's last dive, it became apparent... (taps the graph paper)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... At the depths these men are diving, it is a physiological impossibility that they can retain enough oxygen in their blood to make it back to the surface.  It's a function of how long it takes to get to the bottom, orient themselves and to return... To attempt to break Mayol's record is simple suicide. (to Novelli)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the last time.  I'm telling you cancel the competition. NOVELLI and the MEDIC look over at the diving platform where ENZO is concentrating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Molinari's a seventeen time world champion.  Do you want to tell him he can't dive. LAWRENCE doesn't answer.  NOVELLI is thinking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get Mayol in here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ENZO is preparing.  He sits at the edge of the platform hyperventilating, almost in a trance. We see JACQUES in the background, talking to NOVELLI, he then walks over to ENZO and climbs down next to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enzo? (no response)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enzo... I know you're angry at me. (no response)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Enzo, it's important. ENZO opens one eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm concentrating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quickly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't dive anymore.  They want to cancel the competition for a while. ENZO looks at him coldly.  Takes another deep breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (rushing on)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not safe, they say.  The doctors say it isn't possible to go deeper and live.  Free diving is over as a sport.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You say that because you have the title!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  I would never cheat you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well that's very nice of you. He takes a last breath, signs himself and reaching for th gueuse, disappears into the water. LAWRENCE, NOVELLI, the MEDICS, and others are arguing. LAWRENCE is furious that ENZO is diving.  NOVELLI is balling out his assistants. JACQUES is on the platform watching the others as if they were a gaggle of geese.  He listens to the sound of the gueuse playing out, watches the depth indicator, the stopwatches.  He knows something is wrong. He walks over to the edge and grabs hold of a little oxygen bottle which is there for security.  He takes a fe breaths of the oxygen as he puts on his flippers and dive down after ENZO.

dialogues.speaker: JACQUES
dialogues.text: JACQUES pulls himself down the cable, hand over hand. 80 or 90 feet down he sees a group of MEDICS coming towar him carrying ENZO'S unconscious body. JACQUES struggles with them, pushes them away, takes ENZO in his arms and climbs toward the surface, frantic, screaming silently at him, desperate to get away from the flow of air bubbles from the scuba tanks, the commotion, the memory of death. ENZO has a big serene smile on his face.  The MEDICS push both divers toward the surface. As if they were on land, JACQUES starts shaking ENZO to wake him up.  He then slaps his face but ENZO remains unconscious. They finally break the surface in each others arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They pull ENZO out of the water.  The doctors open his jacket.  ENZO motions to JACQUES to come close.  He still has that long smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (faintly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (moved)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I was right about what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a long silence)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... It is much better down there. It's a better place. He tries to take a deep breath, the effort is exhausting. JACQUES smiles, holding back his tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Push me back in the water...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (crying)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacques, take me back down... Please. His smile freezes, he stops breathing.  His eyes close. JACQUES puts his head down on his friend's chest and sobs The doctors gently try to move him away, but JACQUES resists.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just give him five minutes!  What does it matter now, anyway... Come on, just leave him alone! LAWRENCE encourages everybody to leave the platform. JACQUES quickly grabs the nearest rope and ties it to his belt.  Before anybody can stop him, JACQUES rolls ENZO'S body back into the water and dives after it.

dialogues.speaker: JACQUES
dialogues.text: He holds ENZO in his arms.  Lets the dead weight of the body pull him down, deeper and deeper.  The rope around JACQUES' waist runs out, stops his descent with an abrupt jerk.  When he feels it, JACQUES lets go... watches as ENZO'S body continues to drift by itself into the bottomless blue...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doctors have run over and are pulling the cable that JACQUES is attached to.  He is unconscious when they pull him up.  They hold him up by his feet.  JACQUES throws up gallons of water.  They put an oxygen mask on his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (listening to his heartbeat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The heart is going to stop!  The stimulator, quickly. Suddenly, everything collapses for JACQUES.  Sounds disappear.  The image slows down, the light fades. JACQUES only hears his heartbeat, which slows down. His heart stops. Among the crowd around him, he sees JOHANA, fresh, gentle smiling.  Her movements are smooth and slowed down.  She smiles at him, simply.  JACQUES smiles back.  The heart starts again slowly. The image goes back to normal. Sounds multiply (doctors, the panic, etc...) and slowly come back. JACQUES falls unconscious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The heart started again!  It's all right! NOVELLI falls back in his chair, relieved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACQUES is lying on the bed, he has a strong fever. JOHANA sits at his feet. LAWRENCE rummages through a medical kit.  He takes a pill from a bottle and gives it to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take this.  Have a good sleep. JACQUES swallows the pills.  JOHANA walks over from the balcony.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweet dreams. LAWRENCE motions to JOHANA that they should let him sleep He goes out of the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tenderly to Johana, who had started to leave the room)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kiss me. JOHANA bends over and kisses him. JACQUES holds her by the arm, doesn't want her to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sleep now.  We'll talk later. JOHANA kisses him on the forehead and leaves the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're at the little zinc bar.  Not talking, not really drinking either, just toying with their glasses. ROBERTO passes, stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've packed all of... Enzo's clothes. (a beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to the radio telephone... (swallowing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... to call Mamma. They watch sadly as he leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACQUES sitting up in bed finally lies down under the sheets.  He turns off the light by the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've moved from the bar to the table.  There is uneate food in front of them.  A third place is set. JOHANA looks at the wall clock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll go see how he's doing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let him sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACQUES is lying on the bed, he is not moving anymore.  H is breathing loudly, as if tired out.  From his POV the room becomes very dark and blue.  The noise is unbearable The ceiling turns into water. JACQUES' eyes are wide open.  His face is sweating.  The water level, from the ceiling, comes down to him, until h is swallowed by it. As he falls into the water, we see a dolphin gulping air at the surface and going back very quickly to the blue. The dolphin meets his group, about ten of them, 250 Kg of muscles, swimming at more than 40 km/H underwater.  They all break through the surface to gulp air regularly. Suddenly, one of them, leaves the group.  He crosses the blue and seems to make sonar-like sounds.  We see a sonar picture.  It's an image in which the dolphin will appear few seconds later.  The dolphin comes up like a rocket, gulps air and goes back down. The sonar image appears again.  Finally, the dolphin, locates a group of fish and starts hunting them, exactly like a war plane.  He manages to break the group in two, then in four, and this way, he isolates his victim. He breaks the surface to gulp air and goes back down.  He goes full power.  The fish he is after are even more divided.  There is only one left, totally lost and in a panic. The exhausted fish is swallowed. The dolphin slows down, goes back up, breaks the surface in slow motion.  Images becomes pale and bright. He screams inhumanly. Image is white, black, silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JOHANA opens the shutters. The room is a shamble of broken glass, water pitcher and glasses, lamps and vases.  The windows are blown out. JACQUES is lying in bed.  There is a thin trickle of bloo coming from his nose and ears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (in a panic)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacques... Are you alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACQUES jumps into ENZO'S boat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (still worried)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacques?  Are you alright?  Answer me!  Are you alright? She jumps down into ENZO'S boat.  He starts the engine. The boat is racing out of the port.  JOHANA yells over th sound of the engine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've got to tell me what happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw how it has to be. JACQUES parks the boat in front of the COMMITTEE BOAT'S DIVING PLATFORM.  He turns on the platform lights:  above and underwater.  He throws down the diving cable:  60, 90 120 feet... JACQUES gets undressed and sits down in the lotus position, concentrating... JOHANA sits down a few feet away and watches him, wondering just how far he is going to push this whole thing. As the cable unrolls, JOHANA starts crying.  She understands that JACQUES is going to dive to the bottom, into the blue, into himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacques, you know I love you. JACQUES is putting on his flippers, and stands facing his gueuse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a silence)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be sad... It's not because of you, it's me.  It's all going on inside me! (a beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've gotta go and see. JOHANA starts pacing up and down the diving platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See what?  There is nothing to see! It's pitch black down there!  It's cold.  You'll be all alone!  Look at me, Jacques!  I am here!  I exist! Look!!! (she starts waving her arms)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm real!  I am not a dream! Jacques will you look at me? (she breaks down)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please! JACQUES has not moved, he still sits motionless, facing his gueuse. JOHANA doesn't know what to do or say.  She is totally drained.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacques?  I'm pregnant.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's good... that's wonderful. It's wonderful for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are the father. Silence.  JACQUES is petrified, without any reaction.  He doesn't understand.  She realizes it's hopeless and stare at the sea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a while)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I lied... to keep you here. She kisses him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Promise me one thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Promise you won't forget me. She pulls the line releasing the gueuse. JACQUES takes a deep breath and grabbing hold of the gueuse, disappears into the water -- as if swallowed by the ocean.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACQUES slides along the cable, pulled by the weight of the gueuse.  He has a beautiful smile on his face.  He is in his element.  Night has closed in around him.  He turn on the headlight of the gueuse, it casts a dim light around him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JOHANA has walked over to the edge of the platform.  She is holding the cable, to "hear" JACQUES' descent. The counter shows that JACQUES is quickly passing the 300 feet mark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACQUES keeps going down, as serene as ever.  He has gained a lot of speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JOHANA holds her face in her hands.  The counter indicate that JACQUES is going very fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gueuse jerks to a stop and shakes the cable.  JACQUES turns his body right side up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The counter now indicates a depth of 600 feet. JOHANA has felt the jolt of the cable.  She cries her tears and looks down at the water.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The headlight on the gueuse illuminates only a few feet around JACQUES, as if he were standing in a circle of light.  He stays there, patiently floating around and around his cable... as if he were waiting for something. A long form circles the border between the darkness and the light. JACQUES holds out his hand.  A dolphin comes and presses its body against it.  Two other dolphins come out of the night.  JACQUES watches in amazement. A dolphin lays his muzzle in JACQUES' hand, ready to lead him off.  JACQUES hesitates. JACQUES lets go of the cable and lets himself be led away Their silhouettes disappear in the deep blue night.
